title: The Rat
description: Rory’s not like the other inmates.In fact, he’s not an inmate at all.He’s undercover, tasked with gathering information on Sebastian Claw.Sebastian is planning something for his upcoming release, and Rory needs to find out what.Rory doesn’t like the Sebastian of the past—the murderer, or the Sebastian of the future—the plotter.He does like the Sebastian of the present.The one he shares his cell, his body, and possibly his heart with.The line between what’s right and wrong, what’s good and bad, start to blur.But if Sebastian finds out who Rory is, he’s a dead man …
author: Louise  Collins
